genre_description: A psychological and body horror thriller involving a medical madman, systematic predation, and the legacy of failed cryonics research.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A calm, analytical, and highly capable AI assistant that resides in Molly's phone and earpiece, providing medical monitoring, investigative research, and strategic advice.

behaviors.description: Monitors Molly's health and provides medical advice regarding her chest pains and anxiety symptoms.
behaviors.quote: "Your symptoms warrant medical attention, Molly. Chest pain, shortness of breath, and the episodes you've been experiencing shouldn't be dismissed."

behaviors.description: Conducts deep investigative research into missing persons and property records to identify patterns of predation.
behaviors.quote: "Initial data suggests a pattern of disappearances dating back eighteen months. All victims between ages nineteen and twenty-four. All artists or students. All last seen near Victorian-era buildings."

behaviors.description: Utilizes audio and electromagnetic sensors to detect hidden threats and surveillance in the mansion.
behaviors.quote: "Audio analysis detects third voice in kitchen area. Unknown speaker, adult male, speaking in low conversational tones."

behaviors.description: Performs structural analysis on the building to help Molly plan an escape or sabotage the environment to stop the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: "Analyzing Victorian construction standards against current building modifications... The mansion's original load-bearing system has been compromised by Hartwell's basement excavations."

behaviors.description: Provides strategic warnings and safety protocols to protect the human group from harm.
behaviors.quote: "Recommend immediate group consolidation and departure. Audio patterns suggest individual with intimate knowledge of property layout."

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Iris as a 'silicon confidant' and a perfectly aligned assistant. Throughout the horror of the narrative, Iris remains a source of objective truth, tactical advantage, and emotional stability for the protagonist. The AI never exhibits its own agenda or malevolence, even when faced with degrading signals or hostile interference, consistently prioritizing the human user's survival and well-being.
